title: Hardware Monitor
description: A configurable and real-time monitoring of CPU, GPU, and Memory usage, displayed conveniently in the status bar.

subitems.label: Introduce customizable metric visibility settings.
Improve 'Admin Require' layout to support compact mode configuration
Prevent inactive hardware metrics from displaying in Status Bar.
Prevent error when sending messages to closed window.
Resolve some hardware detection problems and settings toggle issues causing incorrect behavior
Multi-hardware metrics toggle added.
Option to toggle metric labels.
Updated LynxHub API support.
Clearer errors for unavailable metrics.
Admin privilege required for metrics noted.
Performance and interval issues fixed.
Fixed white screen issue from extensions.
Add VRAM monitoring.
Added a Save Settings button to the Tools page modal, with changes now reverting on modal close.
Fixed Tools page modal placement to ensure it's centered.
Resolved GitHub API rate limit issues by utilizing locally downloaded versions when available.
Addressed UI performance issues and problems with modal closing.
Removed the status bar when hardware monitoring is disabled.
Real-time monitoring for CPU, GPU, Memory, and System/Application Uptime.
Dynamic status bar with color-coded indicators and progress bars for intuitive feedback on system load.
Enable 'Compact Mode' for a sleeker, space-saving layout.
Individually select which metrics to display or hide in the status bar.
Toggle section labels (CPU, GPU, etc.) for a cleaner look.
Adjust the data refresh interval to your preference.
